name: Pasta
description: A pasta made with white pasta sauce.
ingredients: Noodles, pasta sauce, choice of meat
instructions: 1. Cook noodles 2. Cook meat and add pasta sauce when meat is ready 3. Enjoy

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A cheap, fried rice meal for any time of the day
instructions: 1. Cook egg 2. Pour in rice 3. Put in oil and stir
